title: Account Request POST request
description: Allows setup of an account access request

PermissionsExpirationDateTime.description: Specified date and time the permissions will expire. If this is not populated, the permissions will be open ended.

TransactionFromDateTime.description: Specified start date and time for the transaction query period. If this is not populated, the request will be open ended.

TransactionToDateTime.description: Specified end date and time for the transaction query period. If this is not populated, the request will be open ended.

SelectedAccounts.description: Provides the details to identify accounts in the account information request.
